'''Kiki''' was an old friend and former college sorority sister of [[Rachel Greene|Rachel's]], played by [[Michele Maika]]. 

Her first appearance was "[[The One With George Stephanopoulos]]" and her final appearance was "[[The One With The Flashback]]" although the latter in reality happened before the former.
